docs.snippet: A continuing steady tone prevailed in the foreign exchange market during the past week. Rates moved narrowly and volume of business transacted was reported as light.
docs.lead_paragraph: A continuing steady tone prevailed in the foreign exchange market during the past week. Rates moved narrowly and volume of business transacted was reported as light.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended April 9, 1954

docs.snippet: NEW ORLEANS, April 11 (AP) -- Marlene Bauer shot a five-under-par 70 today to overcome a five-stroke deficit and win the $5,000 Colonial Country Club P. G. A. golf tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW ORLEANS, April 11 (AP) -- Marlene Bauer shot a five-under-par 70 today to overcome a five-stroke deficit and win the $5,000 Colonial Country Club P. G. A. golf tournament.

headline.main: MISS BAUER TAKES COLONIAL TOURNEY; Shoots a 5-Under-Par 70 to Overcome 5-Stroke Deficit and Wins With 297 Total

docs.snippet: I read in your newspaper where Raul Lamuraglia, respected Argentine business man, was taken to prison with his son on April 2.

headline.main: Lack of News in Argentina; Consequence of Silencing La Prensa Seen in Lamuraglia Arrest

docs.snippet: BEAUMONT, Tex., April 16 (UP) -- Diminutive Betty Hicks took the lead on a soggy course in the second annual Babe Zaharias open tournament today with a 39, 35 -- 74.
docs.lead_paragraph: BEAUMONT, Tex., April 16 (UP) -- Diminutive Betty Hicks took the lead on a soggy course in the second annual Babe Zaharias open tournament today with a 39, 35 -- 74.

headline.main: Betty Hicks Cards 74 for 2-Stroke Lead Over Mrs. Zaharias and Louise Suggs

docs.snippet: BEAUMONT, Tex., April 18 (UP) -- Louise Suggs of Atlanta, Ga., won the second annual Babe Zaharias open golf tournament today with a par 73 for 224, two strokes better than the honoree, Mrs. Babe Zaharias.
docs.lead_paragraph: BEAUMONT, Tex., April 18 (UP) -- Louise Suggs of Atlanta, Ga., won the second annual Babe Zaharias open golf tournament today with a par 73 for 224, two strokes better than the honoree, Mrs. Babe Zaharias.

headline.main: MISS SUGGS' 224 BEST BY 2 SHOTS; Mrs. Zaharias Runner-Up in Texas Golf Named in Her Honor -- Miss Hicks 3d

docs.snippet: President Juan D. Peron of Argentina was accused yesterday by the Metropolitan Club of New York of "police state methods" and of having suppressed habeas corpus in the arrest April 2 of Raul Lamuraglia, a former Argentine textile magnate.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Juan D. Peron of Argentina was accused yesterday by the Metropolitan Club of New York of "police state methods" and of having suppressed habeas corpus in the arrest April 2 of Raul Lamuraglia, a former Argentine textile magnate.
docs.abstract: NY Met Club scores Peron on Lamuraglia arrest, wire

headline.main: PROTEST SENT TO PERON; Metropolitan Club Deplores the Arrest of Textile Man
